name: And... Action?!
description:
ROLL CAMERA. ROLL SOUND. AND ACTION?!

a short idiots-to-lovers visual novel where your choices apparently matter...

who would've thought?

play as an aspiring director who should've aspired to have some self-awareness when accidentally stealing the heart of the leading actor... or, was it on purpose? 

created for yaoijam 2022!

FADE IN: FEATURES
  • around 10k words
  • written in screenplay format
  • starring an clueless buffoon, a hopeless romantic, and two tired friends along for the ride
  • three endings
CLOSING CREDITS

story, code, background art: miseri accordion

character art: buntenjou

twine template: sun labyrinth

additional assets: unsplash , flaticon, pexels

music: song for tiny guitar by louie zong
